casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Foreclosure of Real Property Under a Deed of Trust Executed by Robert C. COLLINS and Rhonda B. Collins Dated June 20, 2006 and Recorded on June 23, 2006 in Book K-30 at Page 975 in the Macon County Public Registry, North Carolina No. 69P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Fred H. Jones, Attorney at Law, Franklin, for Collins, Robert C., et al. Rebecca K. Lindahl, Attorney at Law, Daniel Trimmer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Beneficial Financial I.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of March 2017 by Respondents in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
